content: > the free version of this pattern > includes all 9 sizes on the blog > here 1 make a quick and easy and super customizable hat or beanie using this easy pattern pick your size and whip it up in this pattern you have a size chart with stitch numbers full instructions photos and charts to make your hat as cute as you want to the pattern comes with step-by-step instructions which you can also follow in the video tutorial 2 > this pattern for a tunisian crochet > beanie was created to support the yarn > for menstrual health campaign > initiated by morine from morine s > shop read more about the campaign > here 3 > > half of the income from the sale of > this pattern goes to the african girl > foundation that aims to equip young > people who menstruate in kenya with > reusable menstrual pads and soap that > should last them for a year you can donate to the project directly as well by going to the website of the foundation 4 you can add cute embroidered motifs to the main section of the hat or you could just skip the embroidery and use this as a regular hat here s a video that shows you how to make the embroidery 5 1 https //yarnandy com/free-and-easy-tunisian-crochet-beanie-pattern/ 2 https //youtu be/dne0-zoem0k 3 https //www morinesshop com/yarn-for-menstrual-health-a-plea-to-do-more/ 4 https //www africangirlfoundation org/ 5 https //youtu be/ok1qhy0gbk0
